allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add X crosshair overlay for screens in canvas view \(v2.0.63\)

- Add diagonal X crosshair from corner to corner on each screen
- White dashed lines matching panel outline style
- New "X" toggle button in Visible Screens section \(next to Pixels\)
- Crosshair enabled by default for all screens

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rewrite Resolume XML export to match Arena 7 format \(v2.0.70\)

- Complete rewrite of exportResolumeXML function
- Use correct XML structure: XmlState > ScreenSetup > screens > Screen > layers > Slice
- Use vertex-based InputRect/OutputRect format \(<v x="" y=""/>\)
- Use Warper > BezierWarper > vertices structure with pixel coordinates
- Use OutputDeviceVirtual with proper attributes
- Add version info matching Resolume Arena 7.23.2
- Skip non-visible screens and screens with zero dimensions

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Resolume XML InputRect to use canvas position \(v2.0.71\)

- InputRect now uses screen''s canvas position \(same as OutputRect\)
- Previously InputRect always started at 0,0 causing all inputs to appear at top-left
- Both Input and Output sections in Resolume now place screens correctly

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add tabbed custom items manager and processor options \(v2.0.77\)

- "Manage Custom Items" now shows both panels and processors with tabs
- Add "Max Input Resolution" field to custom processor
- Add "Uses Distribution Box" toggle with name and ports fields
- Custom processors with dist boxes now calculate distribution counts
- Improved modal styling for checkbox groups

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
